lines.text: Say albert, isn't that a plumber's helper you're mixin' with?
I ain't no snob! I'd even mix with a congersman's aide if... if I thought it'd help!

[to Mam'selle Hepzibah]
There'll only be one lady, YOU, and you'll be important... why, when Pogo gets his picture on a postage stamp, you'll be right there... on the back!

Hmm now first of all, uh, we should build a "Cleopatra's barge" for Miss Hepzibah, then we tow it twelve miles offshore and she rows up the Potomac, greeted by flame-throwers and a ba-rrage of flowers... we whisk her to the white house, and there on the lawn is her Prince Pogo!
Issue sure is the issue with birth control!
